findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: A floating pragma is set which can cause bytecode variation between builds.

findings.title: State variable visibility is not set (SWC-108)
findings.description: Variables can be specified as being public, internal, or private. Explicitly define visibility for all state variables.

findings.title: Use of "tx.origin" as a part of authorization control (SWC-115)
findings.description: Use of tx.origin should not be used for authorization. Use msg.sender instead.

findings.title: Owner Can Update Tax Rates
findings.description: The owner has the ability to update max buy, sell, and transfer tax up to 20% each and max roundtrip tax up to 25%, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Can Update Max Transaction Amount
findings.description: The owner has the ability to update the maximum transaction amount to a value not lower than 0.5% of the total supply.

findings.title: Owner can update max wallet amount not lower than 1% of total supply
findings.description: The owner has the ability to update the maximum wallet amount to a value not less than 1% of the total supply.
